https://www.arcaderenovations.com/rgb-led-panel-for-ultimarc-utrak-trackballs.html

12v DC
10 5050 RGB LEDs
RGB remote controller that sends commands over IR

Plug and play for the most part, the remote uses a coin battery (CR2032)
The LEDs hooks to a power plug, the MCU controlling it is inside the LED controller cable that provides a bridge to the power and the LED.
